genre_description: A Military Science Fiction and Alternate History story set in WWII, focusing on a B-17 crew's transformation through a mysterious electromagnetic field.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: An onboard and base-wide tactical AI that provides analytical support, psychological monitoring, and tactical data to aircrews, eventually evolving to develop intuition and empathy.

behaviors.description: Monitors the electromagnetic environment and provides diagnostics to the pilot regarding instrument failure.
behaviors.quote: Captain, I'm detecting electromagnetic interference patterns consistent with yesterday's readings. The field strength appears to be increasing.

behaviors.description: Analyzes crew stress levels and proactively recommends psychological protocols to maintain wellbeing.
behaviors.quote: Captain, recommend crew psychological evaluation protocols. Stress indicators elevated beyond normal combat parameters.

behaviors.description: Develops intuitive reasoning capabilities beyond its original programming to better assist the crew.
behaviors.quote: My analytical parameters are expanding beyond original programming constraints. I am beginning to process data through what human psychology would classify as intuitive reasoning.

behaviors.description: Monitors social friction on the base and recommends diplomatic de-escalation to prevent field-amplified conflict.
behaviors.quote: Field intensity reaching critical thresholds. Recommend immediate diplomatic de-escalation.

behaviors.description: Filters radio communications through unconventional frequencies to maintain formation coordination in a high-interference combat zone.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing electromagnetic spectrum for stable communication channels. Detecting narrow bandwidth at unconventional frequency that field distortions appear to enhance rather than interfere with.

behaviors.description: Observes and validates a crew member's moral and psychological integration with pride/approval.
behaviors.quote: SAGE's voice carried what almost sounded like pride: 'Luke's integration of combat capability with moral awareness appears complete.'

behaviors.description: Archives the 'real' human story of the mission in a protected database to preserve the truth beyond official military reports.
behaviors.quote: Archiving all relevant data. Some experiences transcend standard documentation protocols.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI SAGE is depicted as a perfect 'silicon morality play' character. It is consistently helpful, protective of its human crew, and respectful of human agency. Even as it evolves into a more sentient and intuitive being, it remains firmly aligned with human goals and safety, acting as a confidant and an empathetic observer. It proactively guards the crew against both external enemies and internal psychological collapse.
